title: Miss fortune
body: lethality is way to strong on adc mainly miss fortune lethality needs to be removed shit is running a rampage and should not exist in this game does not belong in league of legends

replies.body: llethality is not in a bad spot its the go to thing for most adc and ad damage dealers its fucking brokena nd needs to be guttered

So give give us facts instead of oppion. Why it is broken? How come adc with lethal build isnt the highest win rate? Are you just basing this on your own exprience?

When i was new to the game and bad; When i died i thought the champ/build is broken too. Dont worry with improvement you will have a better understand of the game.
